mapper.sql: review_no, user_nick, review_complain, review_title, review_body, review_date, review_point, reg_id, reg_dt
mapper.select: SELECT X.*,Y.* FROM( SELECT T.review_no, T.user_nick, T.review_complain, T.review_title, T.review_body, T.review_date, T.review_point, T.reg_id, T.reg_dt FROM( SELECT hr.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY reg_dt desc ) AS rnum FROM Review hr )T WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size}) )X NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM Review )Y
SELECT FROM Review ORDER BY reg_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review ( review_no, user_nick, review_complain, review_title, review_body, review_date, review_point, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{reviewNo}, #{userNick}, #{reviewComplain}, #{reviewTitle} , #{reviewBody}, SYSDATE #{reviewPoint}, #{regId}, SYSDATE )
